alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:55AM AKST until February 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Wind chills to 50 below. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
